ailist.AIList.bin_means¶

AIList.bin_means(self, int bin_size=100000)¶

Find mean of values for intervals overlapping binned positions

Parameters
bin_size

int (Size of the bin to use)

Returns

Return type

pandas.Series{double} (Position on index and mean as values)
